data.name: Geneshift: Supporter's Edition
data.detailed_description:
The Supporter's Edition provides extra content without giving unfair pay to win advantages online. It includes full singleplayer and co-op survival runs, 70 bonus challenges, the ability to customize your skill build, private bot matches, and exclusive cosmetics to show your support!



  • Customizable Skill Builds
    Create unique skill builds by customizing the skill draft. Guarantee that your favorite skills appear every game when you hit levels 2, 4 and 6.
  • Skill Medals & Cosmetics
    Display exclusive cosmetics like the Supporter's medallion next to your name. Also progress your skill medals beyond level 4 up to level 20.
  • Unlock 70 New Challenges
    Complete challenges of increasing difficulty and gain bonus rewards. You'll also be able to complete one extra daily challenge per day.
  • Solo & Co-op Survival Runs
    Play full survival runs beyond the first round. Compete on leaderboards, access hardcore mode and play with friends in 4 player online co-op.
  • Host Private Bot Matches
    Host local matches of all game modes. Add easy or hard bots and fight them with 0 ping. You can also add a password and invite your friends.

data.short_description: The Supporter's Edition provides extra content without giving unfair pay to win advantages online. It includes full singleplayer and co-op survival runs, 70 bonus challenges, the ability to customize your skill build, private bot matches, and exclusive cosmetics to show your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run at 60+ fps. Requires the internet to save your progress, stats and highscores.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz multi core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run at 60+ fps. Requires the internet to save your progress, stats and highscores.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run at 60+ fps. Requires the internet to save your progress, stats and highscores.
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: 2.5 GHz multi core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB. OpenGL 2.0+ recommended.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
